technologies.name: TYPO3 CMS
technologies.description: TYPO3 is a free and open-source Web content management system written in PHP.

technologies.name: Cart Functionality
technologies.description: Websites that have a shopping cart or checkout page, either using a known ecommerce platform or a custom solution.

technologies.name: Apple iCloud Mail
technologies.description: Apple iCloud Mail is a webmail service provided by Apple, Inc.

technologies.name: PHP
technologies.description: PHP is a general-purpose scripting language used for web development.

technologies.name: Firebase
technologies.description: Firebase is a Google-backed application development software that enables developers to develop iOS, Android and Web apps.

technologies.name: Bootstrap
technologies.description: Bootstrap is a free and open-source CSS framework directed at responsive, mobile-first front-end web development. It contains CSS and JavaScript-based design templates for typography, forms, buttons, navigation, and other interface components.

technologies.name: Amazon Web Services
technologies.description: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a comprehensive cloud services platform offering compute power, database storage, content delivery and other functionality.

technologies.name: Taggbox
technologies.description: Taggbox is an UGC platform to collect, curate, manage rights, and publish user-generated content marketing campaigns across multiple channels.

technologies.name: Google Tag Manager
technologies.description: Google Tag Manager is a tag management system (TMS) that allows you to quickly and easily update measurement codes and related code fragments collectively known as tags on your website or mobile app.

technologies.name: Font Awesome
technologies.description: Font Awesome is a font and icon toolkit based on CSS and Less.

technologies.name: Moment.js
technologies.description: Moment.js is a free and open-source JavaScript library that removes the need to use the native JavaScript Date object directly.

technologies.name: Matomo Tag Manager
technologies.description: Matomo Tag Manager manages tracking and marketing tags.

technologies.name: Matomo Analytics
technologies.description: Matomo Analytics is a free and open-source web analytics application, that runs on a PHP/MySQL web-server.

technologies.name: jQuery UI
technologies.description: jQuery UI is a collection of GUI widgets, animated visual effects, and themes implemented with jQuery, Cascading Style Sheets, and HTML.

technologies.name: jQuery
technologies.description: jQuery is a JavaScript library which is a free, open-source software designed to simplify HTML DOM tree traversal and manipulation, as well as event handling, CSS animation, and Ajax.

technologies.name: Google Analytics
technologies.description: Google Analytics is a free web analytics service that tracks and reports website traffic.

technologies.name: Fasterize
technologies.description: Fasterize is a website accelerator service.

technologies.name: core-js
technologies.description: core-js is a modular standard library for JavaScript, with polyfills for cutting-edge ECMAScript features.

technologies.name: Priority Hints
technologies.description: Priority Hints exposes a mechanism for developers to signal a relative priority for browsers to consider when fetching resources.

technologies.name: Google Font API
technologies.description: Google Font API is a web service that supports open-source font files that can be used on your web designs.

technologies.name: reCAPTCHA
technologies.description: reCAPTCHA is a free service from Google that helps protect websites from spam and abuse.

technologies.name: Amazon CloudFront
technologies.description: Amazon CloudFront is a fast content delivery network (CDN) service that securely delivers data, videos, applications, and APIs to customers globally with low latency, high transfer speeds.

technologies.name: Zendesk
technologies.description: Zendesk is a cloud-based help desk management solution offering customizable tools to build customer service portal, knowledge base and online communities.

technologies.name: Microsoft 365
technologies.description: Microsoft 365 is a line of subscription services offered by Microsoft as part of the Microsoft Office product line.

technologies.name: Webpack
technologies.description: Webpack is an open-source JavaScript module bundler.

technologies.name: PWA
technologies.description: Progressive Web Apps (PWAs) are web apps built and enhanced with modern APIs to deliver enhanced capabilities, reliability, and installability while reaching anyone, anywhere, on any device, all with a single codebase.

technologies.name: Open Graph
technologies.description: Open Graph is a protocol that is used to integrate any web page into the social graph.
